import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; export default function AddEmployee() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ fullName: '', employeeId: '', gender: '', dateOfBirth: '', contactInfo: '', maritalStatus: '', nationalIdNumber: '', passportInfo: '', emergencyContact: '', bankAccountDetails: '', taxAndSalaryInfo: '', residencyStatus: '', employmentStartDate: '', employmentStatus: '', jobTitle: '', department: '', reportingManager: '', compensationDetails: '' }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData((prevData) => ({ ...prevData, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (Object.values(formData).every((value) => value.trim() !== '')) { console.log('Submitted Data:', JSON.stringify(formData, null, 2)); } else { console.log('Please fill in all the fields.'); } }; useEffect return (

Add New Employee

Close Edit Refresh
); }
